name: Coding Standards
description: Rules for Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, and general code quality

rules.name: Python Standards
guidelines: Use Type hints for all function parameters and return values
Use Django's Class-Based Views for all view implementations
Implement custom mixins for reusable functionality

rules.name: JavaScript/TypeScript Standards
rules.description: Standards for JavaScript and TypeScript code
guidelines: Use TypeScript for all new frontend code
Prefer functional components with hooks over class components
Use TypeScript interfaces for prop types and data models

rules.name: Code Quality Standards
guidelines: Maintain maximum cyclomatic complexity of 15 per function
Keep functions under 50 lines of code
Use meaningful variable and function names
Remove unused code instead of commenting it out
